page_content=' and TCP’s many small ACKs are one reason [4],' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' ACKs share the same medium route with data packets,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' causing similar medium access overhead despite the much smaller size of the ACKs [8]–[12].' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Contentions and collisions,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' As described in RFC 1122 [6] and updated in RFC 5681 [7],' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' L is strictly limited up to 2,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and α is tens to hundreds of milliseconds and varies in different Linux distributions.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Even when L is allowed to be set larger than 2,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the delayed ACK mechanism is far from being optimal.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' According to Equation (3),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' when bw meets bw L·MSS > 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' then fdelayed = bw L·MSS,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the higher data throughput,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the higher ACK frequency,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which might be unnecessary.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' On the other hand,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' when bw meets bw L·MSS < 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' then fdelayed = 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ACK frequency cannot decrease proportionally with the decrease of bw,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which wastes resources.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' That is, ftack = min{ bw L·MSS , 1 α}.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In practice, α can be set to a fraction of RTT (RFC 4341 [9]), i.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', α = RT Tmin β .' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' RT Tmin is the minimum RTT observed over a long period of time,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and β indicates the number of ACKs per RT Tmin.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' As a consequence,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the frequency of TACK is in reality given as follow: ftack = min{ bw L · MSS ,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' β RT Tmin } (4) The frequency of TACK is decided by the bdp,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' where bdp = bw × RT Tmin.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' When bdp is large (bdp ≥ β · L · MSS), ACK frequency is bounded by RTT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' On the other hand,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' when bdp is small (bdp < β · L · MSS),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ACK frequency is reduced proportionally to data throughput.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' β indicates the number of ACKs per RTT,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and L indicates the number of full-sized data packets counted before sending an ACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' According to Equation (4), with a large RT Tmin, TACK might be excessively delayed.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' When loss occurs during the TACK interval,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the excessive TACK delay might disturb loss detection,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' resulting in costly retransmission timeouts.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK loss further aggravates this problem.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, RT Tmin = 200 ms, bw = 10 Mbps, and L = 1, then ftack = 20 Hz.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Compared with per-packet ACK, TACK can cause the feedback delay up to 50 ms upon loss event.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' If the TACK is lost or the retransmission is lost again, then the delay doubles.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Biased round-trip timing.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The initial RTT can be com- puted during handshakes (Figure 5 (a)),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' after that,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender calculates an RTT sample upon receiving a TACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For exam- ple in Figure 5 (b), a packet is sent at time t0 and arrives at time t2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Assume that the TACK is generated and sent at time t3,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the receiver computes the TACK delay Δt = t3 − t2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The sender therefore computes the RTT according to Δt, t0 and the TACK arrival time (t1), i.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', RT T = t1 − t0 − Δt.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' By measuring Δt at the receiver,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK assures an explicit correction for a more accurate RTT estimate.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The problem here is that multiple data packets might be received during the TACK interval,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' as shown in Figure 5 (c),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' generating only one RTT sample among multiple packets is likely to result in biases.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, a larger minimum RTT estimate or a smaller maximum RTT estimate.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In general, the higher the throughput, the larger the biases.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' One alternative way to reduce biases can be that,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' Burst send pattern.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' A burst of packets can be sent in response to a single delayed ACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Legacy TCP usually sends micro bursts of one to three packets,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which are bounded by L ≤ 2 according to deﬁnition of TCP’s delayed ACK [7].' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' However, the fewer ACKs sent, the larger the bursts of packets released.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Since TACK might be excessively delayed,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the burst send pattern is non-negligible as it may have a larger buffer requirement,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' higher loss rate and longer queueing delay if not carefully handled.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Delayed send window update.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' With a small frequency,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK probably delays acknowledging packet receipts and reporting the RWND,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' resulting in feedback lags and bandwidth under- utilization.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, ftack = 20 Hz, then TACK is sent every 50 ms.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Assume a TACK notiﬁes RWND = 0 due to receive buffer runs out at t = 0 ms,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' upon receiving this TACK,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' the sender stops sending data.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In the case that the receive buffer is released at t = 5 ms due to loss recovery,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender continues to be blocked for another 45 ms until a subsequent TACK is sent at t = 50 ms,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and thus wastes opportunity of sending data.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK loss further aggravates this issue.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' C.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK-Based Acknowledgment Mechanism Applying TACK signiﬁcantly reduces ACK frequency.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' However,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' as discussed above,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' independently using TACK probably falls short of robust loss recovery,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' accurate round- trip timing,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and effective send rate control.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' What we really want,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' for WLAN,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' is a full TACK-based acknowledgment mechanism that overcomes the hurdles for applying TACK,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' using a controlled frequency of ACKs to support efﬁcient transport.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' effectively avoiding timeouts.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='SEQ = 4.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='SEQ = 4 is dropped again, when subsequent packet [4500 ∼ 5999] with PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ = 5 arrives, the receiver is still able to detect the retransmission loss.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' However,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' without packet number,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' receiver-based loss detection can hardly detect the exact num- ber of lost retransmissions.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' We note that, for the TACK-based protocol, the sender has to maintain a two-tuples (SEQ, PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ) for each packet.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Although retransmissions will have different PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQs, for implementation it is recommended the PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ of a packet in the tuples be always replaced and updated by the latest PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ of the retransmitted packet.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' This is reasonable since the packet with a smaller PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ has already been retransmitted,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender does not need to maintain extra state to check on whether this packet has been received.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In this case, the extra overhead by introducing the packet number turns out to be negligible.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The packet number in TACK is semantically similar to the packet number as speciﬁed in QUIC [34].' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' IACK speeds up loss recovery on lossy data path.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The legacy TCP sends per-packet ACK when loss occurs,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' in con- trast,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' our design only sends a single IACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Loss-event-driven IACK is a supplemental method for TACK to assure rapid reaction to loss events,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' signiﬁcantly reducing feedback delay of TACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The IACK determines losses according to the out-of- order packets in the PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ space.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='1 Speciﬁcally, the IACK integrates two ﬁelds, the largest PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ and the second largest PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ of the received packets,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' to indicate the most recent range of lost packets,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' with which the sender can retransmit lost packets timely upon IACK arrivals.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Considering the above example, assume packet with PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ = 1 is received and PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ = 2 is dropped, upon packet with PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ = 3 arrives, an IACK contains PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ = 1 and PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ = 3 is constructed according to the out-of-order delivery,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' notifying the sender of the loss of PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ = 2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' To investigate how the loss-event-driven IACK impacts loss recovery,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' we randomly sample the packet loss rate between 0 and 3% on data path,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and the RTT between 1 and 200 ms.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' TCP-TACK might fail to report enough number of ACK blocks (e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='g.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', more than 4) in the case of bidirectionally lossy paths.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In this case,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' we ﬁrst deﬁne more types of ACKs by extend- ing the TCP options in the TCP header,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and then extend the TCP data ﬁeld to carry more information in ACKs.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' This design rationale comes from three concerns: First,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the TCP option extension makes full use of the residual header space.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Second,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the data ﬁeld extension only increases the size of ACKs rather than increasing the number of ACKs.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Ultimately,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' DISCUSSION, LIMITATIONS, AND FUTURE WORK Buffer requirement.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Sending fewer ACKs increases bottle- neck buffer requirement.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Ideally, buffer requirement is decided by the minimum send window (Wmin), i.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', Wmin − bdp.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Given by [10], we have Wmin = β β−1 ·bdp, β ≥ 2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' By default, TCP-TACK (β = 4) requires a bottleneck buffer of 0.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' [5] proposed HACK by changing Wi-Fi MAC to carry TCP ACKs inside link-layer ACKs,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' this eliminates TCP ACK medium acquisitions and thus improves TCP goodput.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='· ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='MSS ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=',' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' 1 α} (3) In practice,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the delayed ACK mechanism can only reduce limited number of ACKs.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' As described in RFC 1122 [6] and updated in RFC 5681 [7],' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' L is strictly limited up to 2,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and α is tens to hundreds of milliseconds and varies in different Linux distributions.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Even when L is allowed to be set larger than 2,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the delayed ACK mechanism is far from being optimal.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' According to Equation (3),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' when bw meets bw L·MSS > 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' then fdelayed = bw L·MSS,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the higher data throughput,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the higher ACK frequency,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which might be unnecessary.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' On the other hand,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' when bw meets bw L·MSS < 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' then fdelayed = 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ACK frequency cannot decrease proportionally with the decrease of bw,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which wastes resources.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' In practice, α can be set to a fraction of RTT (RFC 4341 [9]), i.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', α = RT Tmin β .' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' RT Tmin is the minimum RTT observed over a long period of time,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and β indicates the number of ACKs per RT Tmin.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' As a consequence,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the frequency of TACK is in reality given as follow: ftack = min{ bw L · MSS ,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' β RT Tmin } (4) The frequency of TACK is decided by the bdp,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' where bdp = bw × RT Tmin.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' When bdp is large (bdp ≥ β · L · MSS), ACK frequency is bounded by RTT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' On the other hand,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' when bdp is small (bdp < β · L · MSS),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ACK frequency is reduced proportionally to data throughput.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' β indicates the number of ACKs per RTT,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and L indicates the number of full-sized data packets counted before sending an ACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='TACK ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='is ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='sent.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' According to Equation (4), with a large RT Tmin, TACK might be excessively delayed.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' When loss occurs during the TACK interval,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the excessive TACK delay might disturb loss detection,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' resulting in costly retransmission timeouts.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK loss further aggravates this problem.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, RT Tmin = 200 ms, bw = 10 Mbps, and L = 1, then ftack = 20 Hz.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Compared with per-packet ACK, TACK can cause the feedback delay up to 50 ms upon loss event.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' If the TACK is lost or the retransmission is lost again, then the delay doubles.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Biased round-trip timing.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The initial RTT can be com- puted during handshakes (Figure 5 (a)),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' after that,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender calculates an RTT sample upon receiving a TACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For exam- ple in Figure 5 (b), a packet is sent at time t0 and arrives at time t2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Assume that the TACK is generated and sent at time t3,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the receiver computes the TACK delay Δt = t3 − t2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The sender therefore computes the RTT according to Δt, t0 and the TACK arrival time (t1), i.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', RT T = t1 − t0 − Δt.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' By measuring Δt at the receiver,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK assures an explicit correction for a more accurate RTT estimate.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The problem here is that multiple data packets might be received during the TACK interval,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' as shown in Figure 5 (c),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' generating only one RTT sample among multiple packets is likely to result in biases.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, a larger minimum RTT estimate or a smaller maximum RTT estimate.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In general, the higher the throughput, the larger the biases.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' One alternative way to reduce biases can be that,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='and ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='send ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='window ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='update.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Burst send pattern.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' A burst of packets can be sent in response to a single delayed ACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Legacy TCP usually sends micro bursts of one to three packets,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which are bounded by L ≤ 2 according to deﬁnition of TCP’s delayed ACK [7].' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' However, the fewer ACKs sent, the larger the bursts of packets released.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Since TACK might be excessively delayed,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the burst send pattern is non-negligible as it may have a larger buffer requirement,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' higher loss rate and longer queueing delay if not carefully handled.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Delayed send window update.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='Send ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='window ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='update ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' With a small frequency,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK probably delays acknowledging packet receipts and reporting the RWND,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' resulting in feedback lags and bandwidth under- utilization.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, ftack = 20 Hz, then TACK is sent every 50 ms.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Assume a TACK notiﬁes RWND = 0 due to receive buffer runs out at t = 0 ms,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' upon receiving this TACK,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' the sender stops sending data.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In the case that the receive buffer is released at t = 5 ms due to loss recovery,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender continues to be blocked for another 45 ms until a subsequent TACK is sent at t = 50 ms,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and thus wastes opportunity of sending data.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK loss further aggravates this issue.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' C.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK-Based Acknowledgment Mechanism Applying TACK signiﬁcantly reduces ACK frequency.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' However,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' accurate round- trip timing,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='SEQ = 5 arrives, the receiver is still able to detect the retransmission loss.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' IACK speeds up loss recovery on lossy data path.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='SEQ and the second largest PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' introducing either large biases or high overhead for large bdp transport.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' Basically, TCP sends an ACK every one or two packets [6], [7], which is frequent.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Although the length of an ACK is usually smaller than the data packet (e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' 1518 bytes for a data packet), ACKs cause similar medium access overhead on the MAC layer.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' By sharing the same medium path for ACKs and data packets,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' frequent ACKs create competitions and collisions [4],' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' [5],' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' As a result, the wastage leads to data rate decline on the data path.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' According to Equation (3),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' which might be unnecessary.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' On the other hand,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' when bw meets bw L·MSS < 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' then fdelayed = 1 α,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' According to Equation (4), with a large RT Tmin, TACK might be excessively delayed.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' For example, RT Tmin = 200 ms, bw = 10 Mbps, and L = 1, then ftack = 20 Hz.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Compared with per-packet ACK, TACK can cause the feedback delay up to 50 ms upon loss event.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' If the TACK is lost or the retransmission is lost again, then the delay doubles.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Biased round-trip timing.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The initial RTT can be com- puted during handshakes (Figure 5 (a)),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' after that,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender calculates an RTT sample upon receiving a TACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For exam- ple in Figure 5 (b), a packet is sent at time t0 and arrives at time t2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Assume that the TACK is generated and sent at time t3,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the receiver computes the TACK delay Δt = t3 − t2.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The sender therefore computes the RTT according to Δt, t0 and the TACK arrival time (t1), i.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', RT T = t1 − t0 − Δt.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' By measuring Δt at the receiver,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK assures an explicit correction for a more accurate RTT estimate.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' The problem here is that multiple data packets might be received during the TACK interval,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' as shown in Figure 5 (c),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' generating only one RTT sample among multiple packets is likely to result in biases.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, a larger minimum RTT estimate or a smaller maximum RTT estimate.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In general, the higher the throughput, the larger the biases.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' One alternative way to reduce biases can be that,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='update.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Burst send pattern.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' A burst of packets can be sent in response to a single delayed ACK.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Legacy TCP usually sends micro bursts of one to three packets,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which are bounded by L ≤ 2 according to deﬁnition of TCP’s delayed ACK [7].' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' However, the fewer ACKs sent, the larger the bursts of packets released.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Since TACK might be excessively delayed,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the burst send pattern is non-negligible as it may have a larger buffer requirement,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' higher loss rate and longer queueing delay if not carefully handled.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Delayed send window update.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content='window ' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='(RWND).' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' With a small frequency,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK probably delays acknowledging packet receipts and reporting the RWND,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' resulting in feedback lags and bandwidth under- utilization.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example, ftack = 20 Hz, then TACK is sent every 50 ms.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Assume a TACK notiﬁes RWND = 0 due to receive buffer runs out at t = 0 ms,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' upon receiving this TACK,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Fig.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' 5.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK-based round-trip timing: a case study.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender stops sending data.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In the case that the receive buffer is released at t = 5 ms due to loss recovery,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the sender continues to be blocked for another 45 ms until a subsequent TACK is sent at t = 50 ms,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and thus wastes opportunity of sending data.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK loss further aggravates this issue.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' C.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' TACK-Based Acknowledgment Mechanism Applying TACK signiﬁcantly reduces ACK frequency.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' However,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' as discussed above,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' independently using TACK probably falls short of robust loss recovery,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' accurate round- trip timing,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' and effective send rate control.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' What we really want,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' for WLAN,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' is a full TACK-based acknowledgment mechanism that overcomes the hurdles for applying TACK,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' using a controlled frequency of ACKs to support efﬁcient transport.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' For example,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' (1) when loss occurs,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the receiver sends an IACK to timely pull the desired range of lost packets from the sender.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' This loss- event-driven IACK enables the rapid response to loss event,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' effectively avoiding timeouts.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' (2) An IACK may be sent in the case that the receive buffer nearly runs out,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' which assures timely send window update.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In addition,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' We believe the improved feedback robustness will more than pay for the TACK extension overhead.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Less number of ACKs.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Although adopting more types of ACKs,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' we still have the advantages of signiﬁcantly reducing ACK frequency in most cases.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' This is because the event-driven IACK is rarely triggered,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' whose frequency is usually low and negligible.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' For example,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' with a packet loss rate (ρ),' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the highest frequency of the loss-event-driven IACK is ρ·bw MSS ,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' this type of IACK only adds a small number of ACKs on the return path in practice.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' First,' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' the frequency of IACK is much lower than ρ·bw MSS because packets are usually lost consecutively.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' Second, ρ is usually a small percentage (e.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='g.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=', < 10%).' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' V.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}

page_content=' PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ directly encodes the transmission order.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' In other words, a packet sent later owns a higher PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content='SEQ than the packet sent earlier.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
page_content=' When a packet is being retrans- mitted, both of its payload and SEQ remain the same while its PKT.' metadata={'source': 'data/data_pdf/Revisiting_Acknowledgment_Mechanism_for_Transport_Control_Modeling_Analysis_and_Implementation.pdf'}
